title: Ticket #7426: condor-bosco is not installable on CentOS 8
description: The condor-bosco RPM depends on 'python >= 2.2'. On CentOS 8, there is no python package. It should depend on python3 for CentOS 8.
remarks:
2019-Dec-20 15:59:55 by edquist:
Code review:

As i think we (TimT and i) discussed in person, it might be better to have spec variables that represent whether python2 and python3 (probably separately) are enabled, and then do the %if=s for the python2 vs python3 paths based on this, rather than basing it on the =%rhel version. But this minimal change for now should accomplish the immediate goal, and we can refactor later, so, LGTM.

Carl
